content.raw:
Can you run the commands below and launch it again?  

```
  $ rm -rfv ~/.ignition/fuel/fuel.ignitionrobotics.org/openrobotics/models
  $ sudo apt-get update && sudo apt-get install --only-upgrade libignition*
  $ sudo apt-get install --reinstall ros-melodic-ros1-ign
  $ sudo reboot

  $ cd ~/subt_ws/src/subt
  $ hg pull && hg up -C
  $ cd ~/subt_ws
  $ catkin_make install
```

‌
